title: Finding secx

title: Lengths
text: The length of the leg opposite of A is $$a=21$$, the length of the leg adjacent to A is $$b=20$$, and the length of the hypotenuse is $$c=29$$.
speech: The length of the leg opposite of A is  a is equal to 21 , the length of the leg adjacent to A is  b, is equal to 20 , and the length of the hypotenuse is  c, is equal to 29 .
